title: Minute Man National Historical Park: Donate
body: Donate       Your interest in supporting Minute Man National Historical Park is deeply appreciated. The park has always relied upon the generosity of individuals, families, organizations, foundations, corporations and small businesses. All donations to Minute Man National Historical Park are handled through our not-for-profit partnering organization, the Friends of Minute Man National Park.  Call, email or write to: Friends of Minute Man National Park 978 318 7822 volunteer@friendsofminutman.org 174 Liberty St. Concord MA. 01742
